casebody.data:
[Cite as 09/02/2003 Case Announcements #2, 2003-Ohio-4768.]

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

September 2, 2003

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2003-1549. Morrison v. Unizan Bank.

Franklin App. No. 03AP-721. This cause is pending before the court as a claimed appeal of right. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for stay of proceedings and request for expedited consideration,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for stay be, and hereby is, denied.

Resnick, J., concurs because the motion is moot.
